name: Grandmaw Cain's Beef Tips and Rice
author: Dawn R
summary: This is one of my family's favorite meals. I got this recipe from my Grandmother. I love to serve this with a side of green beans. Great the next day and reheats or freezes well. Great on those rainy days.
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) packages long grain and wild rice mix
directions: Melt butter with olive oil in a large heavy pot or Dutch oven over medium heat
Place flour in a shallow bowl and dredge the beef tips in the flour
Brown the beef in the hot butter and oil, stirring often, about 15 minutes
Pour water into the pot and scrape to dissolve browned food bits from the bottom of the pot
Stir in the flavor packets from the rice mix and dissolve; mix in the rice and mushrooms
Bring the mixture to a simmer and reduce heat to medium-low; simmer until beef is tender and the rice has absorbed the liquid, 20 to 30 more minutes
